Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2024-712: Medium priority package update for microcode_ctl
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2024-22374:
	Insufficient control flow management for some Intel(R) Xeon Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.
